title: Leading with intention, Make the Difference you feel called to be
description: This book is intended to be a wholehearted guide on your journey, offering you a set of practices and thinking tools to help you make the difference you want to make. Our journeys to better leadership may never end, but at some reflection points in the future, if you have used the material in this book, our hope is that you will feel that your impact is greater than before. You are getting more visible results in the world and they are more like what you want. At the same time, you feel more balanced, more in integrity with yourself, more free, more healthy, more connected, more alive.
author: Christine Neidhardt
